meta_title: Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 – NATO Dial & Military Strap
meta_description: Discover the NATO dial variant of the Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177, featuring matte black dial with red 3H tritium markers, rugged factory PVD case, and original nylon NATO strap. A true military chronograph powered by Lemania 5100 movement.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7177 NATO dial, Military Chronograph NATO strap, Porsche Design black dial, Lemania 5100 dial, 3H tritium dial, Nylon NATO watch strap, 1980s military watch, Porsche Design military chronograph

list.title: Issued:
list.text:
The 7177 NATO variant was reportedly issued to individuals at
NATO headquarters in Brussels.

list.title: Nato Dial:
list.text:
Features a Baseline dial, with the addition of “NATO” at 4
O’Clock.

list.title: Finish:
list.text:
The NATO variant was always coated in Cadet Grey PVD and
came on a matching grey BUND-style leather strap.

list.title: Day/Date Wheel:
list.text:
The 7177 NATO Dial is believed to be the only variant of
the 7177 reference to feature a factory white day/date wheel - a
characteristic observed on select examples of this model.
